name: Game Dev TV Game Jam - Post Jam release Vanquished
name_original: Game Dev TV Game Jam - Post Jam release Vanquished
description:
post Jam release

Major BugFixes

improved player feedback to damage ,

improved UI

improved controls ,

improved player situation feedback

more balanced game play

controls

move with arrow keys, jump with space and  attack with  J or F key

P key  to pause Game

controller support also added .

Game Made in 10 days -For The Game Dev TV 2022 game Jam

theme

DEATH IS ONLY THE BEGINNING!

Terminal lucidity, 

An unexpected return of mental clarity and memory, or suddenly regained consciousness that occurs in the time shortly before death in patients with severe psychiatric or neurological disorders.

August has been asleep for a long time, some say he’s as good as dead.

But Antoinette has never given up hope that one day he will awake. She never left his side. Like a spider on the wall the coldness crawled up her spine, she stood anesthetized, as she saw his eyes suddenly open.

Back arched and screaming he awoke …

GitHub Link  https://github.com/deeraghoogames/GameDevTV2022
